## TypesettingUtils namespace

Collection of different constants and utility functions used by \[\[Typesetter\]\]s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare namespace TypesettingUtils 
```

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [computeGlyphTransform(transform, position, scale, rotation, localRotation)](./harp-text-canvas.typesettingutils.computeglyphtransform.md) | Computes the transformation matrix for a glyph. |
|  [getDirection(glyphs, offset)](./harp-text-canvas.typesettingutils.getdirection.md) | Returns the first strong direction (LTR or RTL) found for a given array of \[\[GlyphData\]\]. |
|  [getPixelSize(size, unit, originalSize)](./harp-text-canvas.typesettingutils.getpixelsize.md) | Convert between any size specified in any \[\[FontUnit\]\] to pixels. |
|  [getSmallCapsScale(glyphs, smallCapsTransformations, index, fontVariant)](./harp-text-canvas.typesettingutils.getsmallcapsscale.md) | Gets the scale applied to a certain character when using the \[\[FontVariant\]\].<code>SmallCaps</code>. |
|  [updateBounds(corners, globalBounds, individualBounds)](./harp-text-canvas.typesettingutils.updatebounds.md) | Updates the supplied bounds with the computed screen-space corners for a given glyph. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [EM\_TO\_PX](./harp-text-canvas.typesettingutils.em_to_px.md) | Ratio between EMs and Pixels. |
|  [OBLIQUE\_ANGLE](./harp-text-canvas.typesettingutils.oblique_angle.md) | Angle used when emulating italic fonts (oblique). |
